subject: App Crash Report: iOS 17.2
body: CRITICAL ISSUE. The app crashes immediately upon launch on my iPhone 15 Pro Max. I have tried reinstalling twice. This started after the v2.2.1 update this morning.

subject: Feature Request: Kanban Board
body: Hi team, big fan of the list view, but a Kanban board would really help our agile workflow. Is this on the roadmap?

subject: Login Issue - OAuth Google
body: I can't sign in using the 'Continue with Google' button. It just spins and times out. My manual login works fine though. Android 14, Pixel 6a.

subject: Suggestion for Improvement: Font Size
body: The font size on the dashboard is too small for accessibility. Please add a setting to increase text size. It is very hard to read on tablets.

subject: Data Loss Problem - URGENT
body: I lost 4 hours of data input! The 'Save' button was greyed out and then the app force closed. When I reopened, everything was gone. iPad Air 5th Gen.

subject: Billing Inquiry - Invoice #9921
body: Hello, our accounting department needs a VAT invoice for the last transaction. The automated email didn't include it. Please send ASAP.

subject: Bug: Dark Mode Glitch
body: When I switch to dark mode, the text in the input fields remains black, making it invisible against the dark background. Samsung S22, OneUI 6.0.

subject: cant find my old projects
body: hey guys i updated the app and now the 'Archived Projects' folder is missing?? where did it go pls help

subject: Security Vulnerability Report
body: I believe I found an IDOR vulnerability in your API endpoint /api/v1/user/data. I can view other users' project titles if I change the ID in the request. Please contact me securely.

subject: Feedback on new update
body: To be honest, the new UI is a step backward. It takes 3 clicks to do what used to take 1. Not a bug, just bad UX.

subject: App Freeze on Large Files
body: If I try to upload a PDF larger than 50MB, the app freezes completely. I have to force quit. Windows 11 Desktop App v2.2.0.

subject: Partner Integration Request
body: We are a CRM platform with 10k users. We would love to build a native integration with your tool. Who is the best person to speak with?

subject: Login Issue: 2FA not sending
body: I am not receiving the SMS code for 2-Factor Authentication. I have tried 'Resend Code' 5 times. Carrier: Verizon. Region: US-East.

subject: Typo in welcome screen
body: Just a heads up, the word 'Successfully' is spelled 'Succesfully' on the onboarding screen. Minor thing but thought I'd let you know.

subject: SYSTEM ERROR CODE 404
body: I am getting a generic 404 error when trying to access the 'Settings' page. This happens on both Web and Mobile. Account ID: 88219.
